title: Glenfiddich Spirit of Scotland Awards

intro: The Glenfiddich Spirit of Scotland Awards are annual awards given to notable Scottish people. It is sponsored by the Scotch whisky company Glenfiddich, in association with The Scotsman newspaper. Nine awards are given out for art, business, environment, food, music, screen, sport, writing, and Top Scot. A consulting panel nominates four people in each category, with the winner decided by public vote. The Top Scot category is an open award, with the public able to nominate anyone. The awards were established in 1998.
